name: Muscle & Tweet
description:
Made for Mini Jam 125
Theme : Signal
Limitation : Everything is tied to the rhythm

———

🐤 How to play

It's time to flex your muscles and flirt with the fabulous Tweet ! Dance in rhythm to catch their attention and get this jungle party started.

First, watch for Tweet's signals and show your move with the perfect timing to slay your way to victory. 

Then, chain some sweet combos to fill the Hype Level gauge and achieve the best score before music ends. 

You're like a bird-of-paradise, it's your moment !

———

⌨️ Controls

Play with minimal inputs on you keyboard when the timing is right :

— Space bar 

— Left Arrow

— Right Arrow

———
